2014-04-16 - Version 1.1
 - Added --raw-args option that passes arguments as-is to dump command (dk-dkopen)
 - Made use of ~/.pgpass possible (JocelynDelalande)

2013-04-12 - Version 1.0.1
 - Added missing README/CHANGES files to MANIFEST.in

2013-04-10 - Version 1.0
 - Added option to specify output filename (bedingue)
 - Added ability to dump to stdout (madssj)
 - Fixed PostgreSQL support (madssj)

2011-09-03 - Version 0.1
 - Initial release.
